benchmark_details.name: ViPlan (Visual Planning with Symbolic Predicates and Vision-Language Models)
benchmark_details.overview: ViPlan is the first open-source benchmark for Visual Planning with symbolic predicates and Vision-Language Models (VLMs), featuring tasks in Blocksworld and a household robotics environment.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a rigorous evaluation of VLMs for planning tasks using symbolic predicates.

data.source: ViPlan features a collection of visual planning tasks in Blocksworld and household robotics using the iGibson simulator.
data.size: 50 tasks (25 each for Blocksworld and Household)
data.annotation: Tasks are procedurally generated with varying levels of complexity.

methodology.calculation: Success rate based on the fraction of tasks completed successfully per model.
methodology.interpretation: Higher success rates indicate better planning capabilities of VLMs.
